metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3544 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in user/profile.php in Moodlethrough 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.x before2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 allows remote authenticated users to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via the Skype ID profile field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3544` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-1').
